techmeme.title: Anthropic releases Claude 3.7 Sonnet, a hybrid model that can produce fast responses or extended, step-by-step thinking, and Claude Code, an agentic coding tool (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Analysis of Apple's financials: Apple's announcement of spending $500B over four years in the US is in line with what it could be expected to spend anyway (Dan Gallagher/Wall Street Journal)
Sensor Tower: during Grok 3's release week, Grok mobile app downloads rose over 10x week over week; Similarweb: US web app daily visits rose from ~189K to 900K+ (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
The Trump admin has fired 130+ staff at CISA, replaced staff refusing DOGE access to networks, appointed a DOD CISO whose clearance was suspended in 2021, more (Brian Krebs/Krebs on Security)
Perplexity teases a web browser "for agentic search" called Comet that is "coming soon" (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
